metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6228 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: heap-based buffer overflow in cpStripToTile() in tools/tiffcp.c

notes.Note: alexmurray> libtk-img and povray both seem to have embedded copies of tiff, whilst libgeotiff appears to duplicate the vulnerable function

criterions.comment: libtk-img: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
tiff package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
